page.description: Define the static list of choices to show in the Spin List control.

discussion.p: The values in the Spin List control can be defined at design-time as a static list of options.
Each value is specified on one line. An optional stored value can be defined separately from the displayed value using the pipe '|' delimiter. For example:

section.example: Red|1 Orange|2 Yellow|3 Green|4 Blue|5 Purple|6

section.description: If you want to include the pipe '|' character as part of the displayed or stored value, it must be escaped using the backslash. EG:
The displayed value can also contain HTML markup:

description.p: Using HTML and CSS, you can add images to the Spin List choices:

section.example: <svg class="icon"><use xlink:href="#alpha-icon-gear"></use></svg> Edit|gear <svg class="icon"><use xlink:href="#alpha-icon-add"></use></svg> Create|add <svg class="icon"><use xlink:href="#alpha-icon-bell"></use></svg> Call|bell <svg class="icon"><use xlink:href="#alpha-icon-calendar"></use></svg> Schedule|calendar
